programme.title: The arrest of Dave Winfield
programme.short_synopsis: The desires of American women in 1983, and the law on  home video taping.
programme.medium_synopsis: The difficulty in legislating against home video taping, the arrest of New York yankee Dave Winfield for killing a seagull, and the marital aspirations of American women in 1983.
